results.title: Nestlé under investigation over alleged mineral water fraud in France
results.snippet: Nestlé is under investigation in France, over claims it used illegal filtration to hide contamination in its mineral water, threatening the status of brands like Perrier. A decision is expected on whether the brand will be able to continue using the term "natural mineral water", soon.

results.title: Nestlé, Danone off the hook in toxic baby food litigation
results.snippet: A US federal judge ruled that the food majors were not culpable for their subsidiaries' flawed safety protocols Nestle SA, Danone SA and Hero AG were stricken off the defendants' list of a multi-district litigation (MDL) alleging their subsidiaries knowingly sold baby food tainted with toxic heavy metals.

results.title: Nestle Baby Food: Toxic Baby Food Lawsuit - TruLaw

results.title: Nestlé Data Breach: A Deep Dive into R00TK1T's Cyber Attack
results.snippet: In a cybersecurity incident, the hacker group R00TK1T has claimed responsibility for a data breach at Nestlé, one of the world's leading food and beverage companies. This breach highlights the ongoing challenges that major corporations face in securing their digital infrastructure against sophisticated cyber threats.
